code: @Test public void stopsMeterRegistryWhenContextIsClosed() {     this.contextRunner.withUserConfiguration(BaseConfiguration.class).run((context) -> {         AtlasMeterRegistry registry = context.getBean(AtlasMeterRegistry.class).         assertThat(registry.isClosed()).isFalse().         context.close().         assertThat(registry.isClosed()).isTrue().     }). }
@Bean public AtlasMeterRegistry customRegistry(AtlasConfig config, Clock clock) {     return new AtlasMeterRegistry(config, clock). }
